name: PONGIL
description:
This is a different version of the basic Pong game where both players can move in all 4 directions and rotate to choose the direction of the ball by themselves! 

The game is played with a joystick only and of course with 2 players. The first player to score 3 goals wins the game!

This is a small game made in 2 days for the final of the LIG Tournament!

Team : 

PEJOIANE Arthur - Game Developper / Game Designer

BARLET Julien - Made the sprites (thanks to him <3)
